resources.string: Would you like to play again?
Multitouch not supported on the device

Please choose board size.
The player would touch and hold the highlighted F-tile, after that new tile will be highlighted.
The 2nd player would touch and hold the next highlighted tile. 
Goes on unitl:
 	 The player clicks on the Worng tile.
 	 The player lifts his finger from previously selected tile
This Device supports 1 or more fingers per person.
This Device supports 2 or more fingers per person.
